Summary: Looked like a star and then it started turning colors and spinning around.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my house doing dishes on January 26th around 8 p.m. EST. My boyfriend went outside on my porch to have a cigarette, as he always does. It was a starry night and he began looking at this (so called) star (disk like shape) that started spinning and turning weird colors. He ran in the house and got his digital camera. Took a video of this surprisingly star that was very entertaining. Spinning up and down and side to side and turning colors. Then it disappeared. Just dropped out of the sky. Anyone know what this is???
